actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE public."corsi" SET
		"nome" = '{{update_form.fieldState.nome.isVisible ? update_form.formData.nome : update_form.sourceData.nome}}',
		"erogatore" = '{{update_form.fieldState.erogatore.isVisible ? update_form.formData.erogatore : update_form.sourceData.erogatore}}',
    "livello" = '{{update_form.fieldState.livello.isVisible ? update_form.formData.livello : update_form.sourceData.livello}}',
		"tipo" = '{{update_form.fieldState.tipo.isVisible ? update_form.formData.tipo : update_form.sourceData.tipo}}',
		"datainizio" = '{{update_form.fieldState.datainizio.isVisible ? update_form.formData.datainizio : update_form.sourceData.datainizio}}',
		"datafine" = '{{update_form.fieldState.datafine.isVisible ? update_form.formData.datafine : update_form.sourceData.datafine}}',
		"durata" = '{{update_form.fieldState.durata.isVisible ? update_form.formData.durata : update_form.sourceData.durata}}',
		"costo" = '{{update_form.fieldState.costo.isVisible ? update_form.formData.costo : update_form.sourceData.costo}}',
		"url" = '{{update_form.fieldState.url.isVisible ? update_form.formData.url : update_form.sourceData.url}}',
		"stato" = '{{update_form.fieldState.stato.isVisible ? update_form.formData.stato : update_form.sourceData.stato}}'
WHERE "idcorso" = {{data_table.selectedRow.idcorso}};
